about_the_game:
With just a dash and a wall climb ability you can speed through worlds! Parkour your way to the end of the level using launch pads, doors & more!

  • Explore through four worlds and 40+ levels
  • A both casual yet action-packed experience
  • Map Editor: Make and play community-made maps using the map editor
  • Multiplayer: Race against your friends on official or community-made maps
  • Leaderboards: Climb up the leaderboards by gaining high scores
  • Unique scoring system that provides infinite replayability
  • Move at Mach 10 (it's seriously very fun)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 | AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 Integrated Graphics | AMD Radeon Vega 3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Required
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required for online level downloading, leaderboards & multiplayer.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 | Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 Integrated Graphics or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
